headline: How Stryker’s (SYK) Robotics Push and Siemens Partnership Could Shape Its Growth Trajectory
summary: Stryker recently opened a 140,000-square-foot research and development center in Bangalore, India, focused on robotics, artificial intelligence, digital health, and product security, and announced a partnership with Siemens Healthineers to co-develop a robotic system for neurovascular procedures. These announcements highlight the company's commitment to accelerating product development and expanding its specialized medical solutions portfolio in emerging markets. We will examine how...
